fonts.name: ZETA
fonts.fontDetails: Econ Sans Regular • Font Size: 21px / 1.3125rem • Line height: 32px
fonts.sampleText: In late January, at the 2019 Tourism Focus event in the capital, Honiara, the government's marketing arm, Tourism Solomons, announced an ambitious target of 60,000 visitor arrivals per year by 2025. Speaking at the tourism event, the prime minister, Rick Hou, indicated that the tourism sector could help to plug the gap left by the expected decline in the forestry sector, upon which the economy is heavily dependent.
